#summary How to install Cg Xcode Plugin.
#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured

= Instructions =

  # Create Directory at ~/Library/Application Support/Developer/Shared/Xcode/File Templates
  # Copy contents of File Templates to ~/Library/Application Support/Developer/Shared/Xcode/File Templates
  # Create Directory at ~/Library/Application Support/Developer/Shared/Xcode/Project Templates
  # Copy contents of Project Templates to ~/Library/Application Support/Developer/Shared/Xcode/Project Templates
